child_mtb_helmet.name: Colorful Helmet
child_mtb_helmet.description: A mountain bike helmet with bright colors and fun stickers. It has soft padding inside and looks protective and well-made. The design suggests it's meant for someone who loves adventure.
child_mtb_helmet.pickup_message: You carefully retrieve the helmet. It's surprisingly light and smells new. Something about it makes you feel protective and excited at the same time.
child_mtb_helmet.use_message: You gently set down the helmet. Its bright colors gleam in the light, and you can't help but wag your tail looking at it.

child_mtb_gloves.name: Mountain Bike Gloves
child_mtb_gloves.description: A pair of mountain biking gloves with protective padding on the palms. The bright colors and fun patterns suggest they're designed for someone who loves adventure and outdoor activities.
child_mtb_gloves.pickup_message: You delicately pick up the gloves with your teeth. They smell like new fabric and exciting possibilities.
child_mtb_gloves.use_message: You place the gloves carefully on the ground. Looking at them, you can tell they're well-made and ready for adventure.

small_mtb_bike.name: Balance Bike
small_mtb_bike.description: A beautiful balance bike with bright and cheerful colors. It's perfectly proportioned and looks ready for adventure. The sight of it fills you with excitement and anticipation.
small_mtb_bike.pickup_message: This bike is too big to carry in your mouth, but you can push it with your nose. As you examine it closely, your heart starts racing with excitement. There's something very special about this bike...
small_mtb_bike.use_message: You sit next to the bike, and suddenly you feel like all the pieces are starting to come together. This bike represents something wonderful that's coming to your family!

garden_key.name: Small Garden Key
garden_key.description: A small brass key that smells like metal and earth. It looks like it might open something in the garden area - perhaps the tool shed where something important is waiting.
garden_key.pickup_message: You carefully pick up the small key with your teeth. The metal feels cool and important.
garden_key.use_message: You drop the key with a small metallic clink. It's clearly meant to unlock something special.

step_stool.name: Small Step Stool
step_stool.description: A wooden step stool that the humans sometimes use to reach high places. Perfect for a determined dog who needs to get to higher shelves or cabinets that might contain important discoveries.
step_stool.pickup_message: You grab the step stool by its edge and start dragging it across the floor. It's heavier than expected but manageable for a strong dog like you.
step_stool.use_message: You position the step stool carefully. Now you should be able to reach places that were too high before!
